name: Malazard: The Master of Magic
description: Unleash the magic inside you!Purify the demonic legion with a set of powerful abilities.The collapsing world relies upon you, experience what it means to become the Master Of Magic!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: integrated
